description:
Get your first FREE taste of Sparkle, a premium action puzzler for your Palm Pre!

"Wow...one of the best games on webOS, entertaining, excellent visuals, audio, pacing, and quick game play, note to self...buy this app!" -Customer Review

"Highly polished and easily recommended action puzzler." -toucharcade.com.

Embark on an extraordinary journey to uncover the secrets of Crowberry Woods. Banish the darkness with your Orb Slinger and reclaim your land!

The basic game play is simple: tap where you want the orb to land. Try to match three orbs to make them disappear. Make several matches in row to receive powerups. Just don't let the orbs fall into the abyss! You'll also discover over ten different powerful amulets throughout your journey. They change the rules of the game in your favor. For example, the Amulet of Firebolt empowers you with powerful fiery bolts - and there are many more!

Also features colorblind mode!
